name: WenetSpeech
description: Large-scale Chinese speech recognition benchmark with 10,000+ hours of multi-domain audio from YouTube.

metrics.name: cer
metrics.definition: Character Error Rate on test sets

test_method: Evaluate on WenetSpeech test sets covering multiple domains (audiobook, commentary, documentary, drama, interview, etc.). Use character-level error rate.
notes: WenetSpeech includes diverse Chinese speech scenarios with varying audio quality. Important benchmark for practical Chinese ASR systems.
